thread.section_title: SSENSE Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SSENSE | ssense.com | 12 of 61
thread.title: Wesley Saban

author: Wesley Saban
title: Wesley Saban
text: Overall shopping with SSENSE was a great experience. I was looking for a pair of FENDI shoes to add to my collection. After looking at literally every website and store (Saks, Nieman Marcus, etc) I found SSENSE. They had just the shoes I was looking for; but not only that, they were also $120 less on SSENSE. I purchased them immediately and got them in the expected time. Overall my experience was 10/10 and I will definitely be purchasing with them again.
